item.title: The coming of lion
item.summary: When the lion is coming, he is preceded by an apparition which resembles a real lion. By /han≠kass’o (L. VIII.-6. 6576 rev.).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-6
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: when its head comes into sight
and the 'apparition' that comes before it does
preceded by an apparition which resembles a real
that appears before the lion does
lion preceded by, which resembles a real lion
when the lion's head comes into sight
